text: INparV4elal@ele[glie pES Radey Amazon Cognito features: » Addsuser sign-up, sign-in, and access control to your web and mobile applications. + Scales to millions of users. « Supports sign-in with social identity providers, such as Facebook, Google, and Amazon; and enterprise identity providers, such as Microsoft Active Directory via Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 2.0.
